definition[0]: if you do something all over again, you repeat it from the beginning
example[0]: I had to write the essay all over again.
definition[1]: used to emphasize that you do the whole of something again from the beginning, or that the same thing happens again
example[1]: Their first plan had gone wrong, so they had to start all over again.
example[2]: We had quarrelled about the money before, and now it was happening all over again.
